Text:
It is another typical day in Alexandria, with angry
shouts and curses filling the air. The owner of the
voice is…

You maggots! And you call yourselves soldiers of the
Shadow Garden?! You're not worthy of the numbers you
were given!
*huff, huff* I-I'm sorry...

If you still have the energy to apologize, you can
keep going... And you, over there! Don't stop
until I say so!

I-Instructor Lambda! We've been running since
morning, and it's almost sunset—

Talking back to your instructor? You've got some
nerve.
Eep! Sir! No sir!

(I may be intentionally overworking them, but there
seem to be more soldiers complaining...)

(They've done well. They're as capable as the Knight
Order in the capital.)

(But we're aiming higher. I must raise soldiers who
can live up to the Shadow Garden's name. That is
the mission I was tasked with by Lady Alpha.)
We're still not done yet! Keep moving!
I... I can't...
M-Me neither...
(I guess they've reached their limit...)

Enough! Today's training is over! Go back to your
dorm rooms and prepare for tomorrow!

Proper rest is also part of your training!
Understood?

(I'm overreliant on the soldiers' mental state...
I've got a long way to go. It's pointless if I can't
keep them under control. I may need to rethink
today's training program.)

(I'm not sure what Lady Alpha really wants,
but I have to make the soldiers stronger.)
Or else, I...
A few days later...
Today we'll work on mental training.

I'll start by asking all of you this: What is
our purpose? You, there, give your answer.

Sir! Yes sir! It's to exterminate the Cult of
Diablos!

Very well... And what is your own purpose?
What are you fighting for?
Well...umm...revenge.
...Fair enough. What about you, next to her?
W-World peace!

Oh? Well, the answer doesn't matter. You're in the
same organization. Why're you fighting for different
causes?
W-Well...!

(They're all visibly shaken. They must've been so
focused on the training in front of them that they
never gave it a second thought.)

...I understand now. You've been fighting like
mindless idiots.

As punishment, you'll spend the day in the forest,
fleeing from enhanced golems and slimes.
Fleeing...? We don't have to defeat them?

I've prepared 100 golems and 300 slimes. All of them
are individually strong enough that you're no match
for them.

All of you, survive the day...as if your life depends
on it!

Turning her back on the replies and screams from the
trainees, Lambda leaves the scene.
A few days later, Alpha summons Lambda to her room.

(Were there numerous complaints from my subordinates
due to the constant rigorous training? Or was there a
significant issue with the training the other day...)

(Whatever it is, I'm not feeling up to the task of
instructing these days. I should embrace the
scolding I'm about to receive...)
Lambda reporting!
...Please come in.
Understood!
